title: Scale a Value between Two Ranges
description: This function scales a given input value from one range to another. The input value X is constrained by the low and high limits (I_LO and I_HI). If the input high limit is the same as the input low limit, the output will be set to the output low limit (O_LO). Otherwise, the function computes the scaled value based on the specified output range (O_LO to O_HI).
name: SCALE_D

input.name: X
input.description: The input value to be scaled.

input.name: I_LO
input.description: The lower limit of the input range.

input.name: I_HI
input.description: The upper limit of the input range.

input.name: O_LO
input.description: The lower limit of the output range.

input.name: O_HI
input.description: The upper limit of the output range.

output.name: SCALE_D
output.description: The scaled output value based on the input range and output range.

return_value.description: The function returns the scaled value.
